text: U.S. Route 20 or U.S. Highway 20 (US 20) is an eastâ€“west United States highway that goes from Newport, Oregon to Boston, Massachusetts. The highway is long. It is the longest road in the United States. There is a gap in the official signage of US 20 through Yellowstone National Park. The park uses unnumbered roads. ==References== Category:U.S. Highways
title: U.S. Route 20
